name: Jingle All the Bells
description:
Suggested browsers: Chrome, Firefox, or Edge

In the giving spirit of this Christmas season we at The Stork Burnt Down have decided to give the world the free gift of Jingle All The Bells, a game about a charity Santa Claus ringing bells to raise money! We are still working away at Home Improvisations in Early Access but we decided to take a short break and create something with a little holiday spirit. With Jingle All The Bells we bring the same absurd attention to the mechanical details of bell ringing that Home Improvisation does to furniture assembly.

Features

  • Charity Santa with fully articulated Bell-Ringing Arm!
  • A variety of pedestrians to infect with the spirit of giving!
  • Play three different bell-themed holiday standards!
  • Customize your charity Santa with sweet accessories!
  • Unlock the true meaning of Christmas???
  • Raise money for 350 totally made up charities*!
  • It's 100% Free!

*To be clear, the game is 100% free with no revenue model and no ads. No real money changes hands. All charitable contributes happen within the fiction of the game.
